title: Say Yes To Heaven
author: Lana Del Rey
lyrics:
[00:19.78] If you dance I'll dance
[00:24.21] And if you don't, I'll dance anyway
[00:29.14] Give peace a chance
[00:33.92] Let the fear you have fall away
[00:38.11] I've got my eye on you
[00:43.06] I've got my eye on you
[00:48.46] Say yes to Heaven
[00:53.15] Say yes to me
[00:57.91] Say yes to Heaven
[01:02.77] Say yes to me
[01:07.72] If you go I'll stay
[01:12.49] You come back, I'll be right here
[01:17.23] Like a barge at sea
[01:22.02] In the storm, I stay clear
[01:26.07] 'Cause I've got my mind on you
[01:31.09] I've got my mind on you
[01:36.40] Say yes to Heaven
[01:41.21] Say yes to me
[01:45.92] Say yes to Heaven
[01:50.72] Say yes to me
[01:54.54] 
[02:15.00] If you dance I'll dance
[02:19.39] I'll put my red dress on, get it on
[02:24.06] And if you fight I'll fight
[02:29.16] It doesn't matter, now it's all gone
[02:33.44] I've got my mind on you
[02:38.31] I got my mind on you
[02:43.57] Say yes to Heaven
[02:48.41] Say yes to me
[02:53.22] Say yes to Heaven
[02:57.94] Say yes to me
[03:02.34] I've got my eye on you
[03:07.21] I've got my eye on you
[03:11.95] I've got my eye on you
